‏المعلقة السياسية دانا وايس – القناة 12 العبرية: إذا استمر القتال في غزة، فلن يكون من الممكن التوصل إلى تهدئة في الشمال من خلال اتفاق، ومن دون حرب، وسيجري تصعيد في مواجهة حزب الله. ولا يمكن ضمان عدم تطور القتال إلى حرب إقليمية.

أبو عبيدة: تبايع كتائب القسام القائد المجاهد يحيى السنوار وتعلن جهوزيتها الكاملة لتنفيذ قراراته، وترى بأن اختياره رئيساً للحركة خلفاً لقائدنا الشهيد المجاهد إسماعيل هنية دليل على حيوية الحركة وتماسكها وقوتها بفضل الله تعالى

‏- الضابط الجريح من لواء الناحال أصيب بنيران مضادة للدروع في رفح جنوبي قطاع غزة
**إطلاق قذائف مدفعية بشكل متقطع خلف مدارس العودة في بلدة عبسان الجديدة شرق خانيونس.**
صفارات الإنذار تدوي الآن في عسقلان وزيكيم
الرئاسة الفلسطينية :  دولة الاحتلال دخلت مرحلة العزلة والرفض الدولي جراء سياساتها العدوانية ورفضها الشرعية الدولية

⭕ أبو عبيدة: أضحى طرد سفير وقطع علاقات مع عدو يبيد شعبًا عربيًا مسلمًا حلمًا لأمة كبيرة سادت أمم الأرض لقرون، ولا حول ولا قوة إلا بالله، وحسبنا الله ونعم الوكيل.


⭕ أبو عبيدة: ختامًا، يا أهلنا، يا شعبنا، كل الوفاء والتحية لكم، يا روح الثورة ومنبع الكرامة للأمة. إننا لا نزال الأحرص على وقف العدوان، فنحن منكم وإليكم، ولن نقبل سوى برفع الظلم عن أهلنا، وإن هذه المعركة المقدسة هي قدر كل الشعوب الواقعة تحت الاحتلال، ونتيجتها الحتمية هي انتصار الحق وقهر المحتلين مهما اندفعوا وطغوا وتجبروا.

⭕ أبو عبيدة: نطمئن مجاهدينا وشعبنا وأهلنا في كل أرضنا بأن طوفان الأقصى الذي بدأ من غزة، وما رافقه ويرافقه من أحداث وتطورات متلاحقة، هو من تلك المعارك التي لا تؤدي بإذن الله إلا إلى تغييرات كبيرة وتحولات استراتيجية قادمة، ستكونون فيها يا أهلنا أنتم صناع النصر وحملة لوائه بدماء شهدائكم الزكية ومعاناتكم الكبيرة وصبركم العظيم ورباطكم المبارك، وإن غدًا لناظره قريب، والله غالب على أمره ولكن أكثر الناس لا يعلمون، وإنه لجهاد نصر أو استشهاد.

⭕ أبو عبيدة:  وفي المقابل، تلقى العدو ولا يزال جوابه من مجاهدينا ومقاومتنا في رفح قتلاً لجنوده وتدميراً لآلياته وكمائن لقواته، وبالتوازي، فإنه يتلقى الضربات الموجعة في كل مكان يتوغل فيه من جديد، في محور وسط القطاع، المسمى نيتساريم، الذي سيكون محورًا للموت والرعب بإذن الله لجنود العدو المحتلين، وسيخرج منه العدو مندحرًا كما خرج من قبل بقوة الله تعالى.

⭕ أبو عبيدة: إن قدرة مجاهدينا على القتال والصمود وإرادتهم لمواجهة هذا العدو باتت أكبر وأعظم بفضل الله، وإن نار الانتقام التي أشعلها العدو بجرائمه ونازيته وساديته كافية لحرقه وتدمير كل مخططاته بإذن الله. 

⭕ أبو عبيدة: سينشأ جيل فولاذي معبأ بإرادة المقاومة والقتال والتصدي للعدو، وهذا أكبر إخفاق استراتيجي للعدو سيدركه بعد حين.

⭕ أبو عبيدة: نؤكد أن القدرات البشرية لكتائب القسام بخير كبير بفضل الله تعالى، وقد تمكنا بعون الله خلال الحرب من تجنيد الآلاف من المجاهدين الجدد من صفوف الإسناد، وهناك آلاف آخرون مستعدون وبدافع كبير للالتحاق متى لزم الأمر.


⭕ أبو عبيدة: تمكن مجاهدونا بفضل الله من إعادة تأهيل وترميم بعض المقدرات  المهمة وتجهيز الأفخاخ والكمائن وتصنيع العبوات والقذائف، وإعادة تدوير عدد كبير من مخلفات العدو من قنابل ومتفجرات وصواريخ ألقاها العدو على أهلنا المدنيين بكثافة عالية جدًا وغير مسبوقة في تاريخ الحروب.

⭕ أبو عبيدة:  فقد عززنا المقدرات الدفاعية لمواجهة الاحتلال في كل مكان يتواجد فيه على أرضنا، ولا يزال لدينا الكثير لنقوله للعدو بإذن الله تعالى،  "لِيَمْكُرُواْ فِيهَا ۖ وَمَا يَمْكُرُونَ إِلَّا بِأَنفُسِهِمْ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ". 

⭕ أبو عبيدة: رسالتنا لجمهور العدو ولعائلات الجنود الصهاينة في غزة ولعائلات أسرى العدو، أنه بات معلومًا لديكم ولكل العالم أن النصر المطلق الذي يتحدث عنه نتنياهو هو انتصاره الشخصي في إقصاء خصومه وبقائه في السلطة في مقابل التضحية بأبنائكم. 

⭕ أبو عبيدة: وبالتالي فإن مصير أبنائكم يا جمهور العدو أصبح لعبة في يد رئيس حكومتكم ووزراء حكومته الصعاليك المهووسين بالتدمير والقتل، وأن كل ما يفعله نتنياهو هو محاولة للهروب من الحقيقة والإخفاق الذي سيلاحقه بقية حياته.

⭕ أبو عبيدة: ما كشف عنه مؤخرًا في أوساط العدو من وثائق استخبارية حول الفشل المدوي في السابع من أكتوبر هو أمر هين بالمقارنة مع ما سنكشف عنه في الوقت المناسب بإذن الله من وثائق ستكون أقسى وأصعب، تظهر كيف استطعنا تنفيذ خداع استراتيجي مركب لجهاز الشاباك والمنظومة الأمنية للعدو لسنوات.

⭕ أبو عبيدة: إن ما يجري من تصاعد مستمر لعمليات المقاومة في الضفة المحتلة في جنين وفي نابلس جبل النار، وفي كل محافظات الضفة والقدس المحتلة، هو رد وخيار شعبنا في مواجهة الإبادة الممنهجة والتهويد والاستيطان الذي تنفذه حكومة العدوان والإجرام. 

⭕ أبو عبيدة: وإن هذا الرد وهذه العمليات المباركة والنوعية لكافة فصائل المقاومة هو ما يليق بشعبنا المرابط الأبي، وهي أكبر رسالة لهذا العدو المتغطرس ولوزراء حكومته النازية، أن كابوس تحرك الضفة والقدس والخلايا الثائرة من الأرض المحتلة عام 48 قادم لا محالة، وبشكل لا يتوقعه العدو بإذن الله تعالى. 

⭕ أبو عبيدة: كل التحية لأبطال ضفتنا، وندعوهم لمواصلة سحق كبرياء هذا العدو المرتعد، ومواصلة عملياتهم وتصعيدها، فهم محط الآمال، وهم أهم حلقة في نهاية حلم هذا الكيان الغاصب.

⭕ أبو عبيدة: تحية واجبة نوجهها لإخواننا المقاومين الأبطال في حزب الله في لبنان الشقيق، ولمجاهدي الفصائل الفلسطينية والجماعة الإسلامية في لبنان ولشهدائهم، ولإخواننا أنصار الله في اليمن العظيم، وللمقاومة العراقية الحرة، والذين أبلغونا جميعًا باستمرار الإسناد الفعال والرفع المتواصل لسقف الرد حتى يتوقف العدوان على غزة.

⭕ أبو عبيدة: لقد لقنوا العدو دروسًا قاسية، وأعادوا للأمة أمل الوحدة في وجه العدوان والقدرة على حصاره وتركيعه، وأشعروه بأنه كيان غريب منبوذ بعد أن توحدت هذه الجبهات في نصرة القدس وغزة وفلسطين بالقول والفعل والقتال وبذل الدماء وشحذ السلاح وفرض التهجير على العدو، وحصاره بحرًا واختراق أجوائه وإرباك منظوماته الاستخبارية والأمنية

⭕ أبو عبيدة: إن ضمير أمتنا الجمعي بالتأكيد ينحاز لهذه المقاومة التي نصرت غزة بإرادة فولاذية وقتال بلا هوادة، فقد سئمت شعوب أمتنا التضامن اللفظي الخجول والعجز الرسمي المقيت.

⭕ أبو عبيدة: لقد حقق مقاتلو أمتنا الأوفياء مفهوم النصرة والوحدة العربية كما لم يحدث من قبل، فما أسعد روح شهيدنا عبد القادر الحسيني بكم يا أبطال أمتنا، وما أشد خيبة أمله من زعماء ناشدهم رحمه الله منذ 76 عامًا، ولا زال صدى صوته لا يحرك فيهم ساكنًا، بل إن عجزهم بات أكبر، وتقاعسهم وخذلانهم أصبح أشد وأقسى.

*أبرز ما جاء في كلمة الناطق باسم كتائب الشهيد عز الدين القسام أبو عبيدة اليوم الأحد:*


⭕ أبو عبيدة: 9 شهور مضت منذ بدء معركة طوفان الأقصى في السابع من أكتوبر من العام الماضي، ولا يزال شعبنا يتعرض للعدوان النازي الصهيو أمريكي والإبادة الجماعية كعقاب له على تمسكه بأرضه ومقدساته وممارسته لحقه الطبيعي، بل واجبه في المقاومة لاسترداد حقوقه وطرد محتليه.

⭕ أبو عبيدة: 9 أشهر نذكر بعدها العالم أن طوفان الأقصى لم يكن بداية التاريخ لعملنا المقاوم ولا لعدوان الاحتلال، بل مثل الانفجار في وجه العدو لما سبقه من عقود قهر وظلم وطغيان من عصابات الصهيونية تجاه البشر والحجر والشجر والأرض والمقدسات.

⭕ أبو عبيدة: بلغت ذروة العدوان مع حكومة صهيونية يراها العالم اليوم تجاهر بعدم الاعتراف حتى بوجود شعب فلسطيني، وتمارس التطهير والإبادة الممنهجة في الضفة والقدس وفي غزة، وتحرض على الوجود الفلسطيني داخل فلسطين المحتلة عام 48. 

⭕ أبو عبيدة: إن فهم شعبنا لطبيعة هذه المعركة وعملية طوفان الأقصى هو ما تعكسه استطلاعات الرأي المستقلة التي أظهرت بعد شهور طويلة من العدوان كيف أن شعبنا في غزة والضفة يؤيد بشكل كاسح عملية طوفان الأقصى ويلتف حول مقاومته. 

⭕ أبو عبيدة: 9 أشهر وما كلت مقاومتنا ولا لانت ولا استكانت، إذ لا زلنا نقاتل في غزة بلا دعم ولا إمداد خارجي بالسلاح والعتاد، ولا زال شعبنا يصمد بلا غذاء ولا ماء ولا دواء وتحت حرب إبادة مجرمة ظالمة.

⭕ أبو عبيدة: تدخل غزة التاريخ من أوسع أبواب المجد كأعظم نموذج حرية عرفته البشرية في العصر الحديث وكمدرسة ملهمة لكل حر ومقاوم وإنسان في العالم.

⭕ أبو عبيدة: يا أهلنا، يا شعبنا، يا أمتنا، يا كل أحرار العالم، يقاتل مجاهدو شعبنا ومقاوموه قتالاً ملحمياً منذ تسعة شهور، ويثخنون في أهداف العدو ويقهرون جيشه المدجج بالسلاح والعتاد والمغطى بالنار من البر والبحر والجو والمدعوم من الولايات المتحدة وبريطانيا شركاء العدوان والإبادة.

⭕ أبو عبيدة: يقاتل مجاهدونا ببسالة ويخرجون للعدو كما توعدناه من اليوم الأول للعدوان، فيقتلون ويصيبون جنوده في كل يوم رغم طول أمد المعركة وبشاعة العدوان، ورغم أننا نقاتل الجيش الأكثر نذالة ودناءة ولا أخلاقية في العالم. 

⭕ أبو عبيدة: جيش يستخدم المدنيين دروعا بشرية ويوهمهم بمناطق آمنة ثم يقصفهم فيها، ويقصف البيوت المدنية على رؤوس ساكنيها، ويستبيح المشافي والمنظمات الدولية والمدارس ومراكز الإيواء المدنية ويتعمد تدمير الآثار والمناطق التاريخية والمساجد والكنائس والمقابر والمكتبات لأنه يخاف من التاريخ الذي يخبره أنه لا مستقبل للغزاة وأنه سيذهب إلى مزابل التاريخ.

⭕ أبو عبيدة: كل هذا يحدث على مرأى ومسمع من العالم وعلى شاشات البث المباشر ليرى العالم من خلال غزة أكذوبة المنظمات الدولية وعجز قوانين حقوق الإنسان المزعومة وعوار العدالة الدولية الانتقائية.

⭕ أبو عبيدة: مجاهدونا يقاتلون بكل صلابة ويبتدعون الوسائل والتكتيكات ويواجهون العدو بروح قتالية عظيمة وبإيمان منقطع النظير كأنهم من زمن صحابة رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم، ويجري الله على أيديهم من الكرامات والثبات ما يعجز اللسان عن وصفه، وصدق الله العظيم: "والذين جاهدوا فينا لنهدينهم سبلنا وإن الله لمع المحسنين".

⭕ أبو عبيدة: على مدار 9 أشهر كاملة، بفضل الله تعالى، قاتلت كل كتائبنا الأربع والعشرين وكل أسلحة الدعم القتالي من أقصى بيت حانون شمالاً إلى أقصى رفح جنوباً، ومعنا فصائل المقاومة إخوة ورفاق السلاح والجهاد.

⭕ أبو عبيدة: خاضت كتائبنا ملاحم وجولات متتالية ولا تزال، فكان أداء مجاهدينا في كل مرة يتقدم ويتطور ويتعاظم، بل يثخن مجاهدونا الجراح في العدو أكثر، ويستفيدون من تجاربهم في كل مرة، وقد قدمنا الشهداء الأبرار من الجنود والقادة من كافة المستويات، لكن الراية لا تسقط ولن تسقط بإذن الله تعالى وعونه. 

⭕ أبو عبيدة: ها هم مجاهدونا يقولون للعدو في كل يوم: "لا مقام لكم في غزة الأبية، لا لناقلة النمر ولا لجنود مرتزقين مجهزين بأحدث تكنولوجيا حربية، ولا لمرتزقة يقاتلون بالأجرة في معركة خاسرة، ولا لقوات تتحصن في البيوت كاللصوص، ولا لضباط يختبئون خلف المدرعات، كلهم سيرحل قتيلاً أو مصاباً أو هارباً مذعوراً بإذن الله تعالى".

⭕ أبو عبيدة:  معركة رفح الجارية منذ نحو شهرين والتي يقدم فيها مجاهدونا بكل بسالة، وما يسطره مجاهدونا أيضاً منذ نحو أسبوعين في الشجاعية، وما رافق هذه العمليات من معارك مشتعلة في شمال القطاع ووسطه وجنوبه، فهو أكبر دليل على بأس مقاومتنا وعنفوانها وعلى فشل العدو وتخبطه.

⭕ أبو عبيدة: كل العالم يشهد خداع المجرم الفاسد نتنياهو ووزير حربه، فقد كانوا يمنون جمهورهم ويخدعون العالم بأن معركة رفح هي الضربة القاضية وهي المحطة الفاصلة، فلم تكن معركة رفح سوى استكمال من العدو لسياسة التدمير الممنهج والمجازر ضد المدنيين.

`Hallo allemaal! Enkele richtlijnen voor de acties de komende dagen, met name aanstaande zondag om 14.00 uur in Schuman:` 
 
1) We proberen onze verdriet en woede op een constructieve manier om te zetten in ongeziene burgerkracht: **het kamp van vrede, liefde, solidariteit en menselijkheid, dat zijn wij! **🕊 
 
2) Ons doel is om mensen van ALLE achtergronden samen te brengen die in een meer humane wereld willen leven. **Laten we daarom leuzen gebruiken in talen die de meerderheid hier in België begrijpt (FR, NL, EN) en zonder religieuze connotatie. **Dit is niet alleen de strijd van één religie, maar de strijd van de hele mensheid. 🤝 
 
3) Het verzet tegen de onrechtvaardigheden die dit volk al 75 jaar ondergaat, mag op geen enkele manier leiden tot passieve of actieve: Essentialisering van de joodse gemeenschap met het Israëlische beleid; Vereenvoudigingen tussen de Israëlische samenleving en de Israëlische regering; Antisemitische boodschappen, daden en toespraken. Dit alles is onaanvaardbaar en zal altijd afbreuk doen aan de vooruitzichten op eenheid met allen die solidair kunnen zijn met deze zaak. **Er zijn veel Joden die de Palestijnse zaak steunen, en we moeten hen beschermen en met liefde omringen. **👏 
 
4) Zondag, **laten we allemaal een actieve rol spelen om ervoor te zorgen dat iedereen gedisciplineerd blijft en dat er geen incidenten zijn. **Elke vorm van misdraging tijdens de manifestatie zal tegen ons en onze zaak worden gebruikt! 💪 
 
5)** Deel dit telegramkanaal en de visuals voor de manifestatie van zondag (14.00 uur Schuman) in GROTE getale! 🔥🔥🔥**

`Salut à tous ! Quelques mots d’ordre concernant les actions des prochains jours, en particulier ce dimanche à 14h à Schuman :` 
 
1)    Nous transformons notre peine et notre colère de manière constructive en force citoyenne historique : **le camp de la paix, de l’amour, de la solidarité, de l’humanité, c’est nous !** 🕊 
 
2)     Notre objectif est de rassembler LARGE des personnes de tous les horizons qui veulent vivre dans un monde plus humain. Pour cela, **favorisons les slogans dans des langues compréhensibles par la majorité ici en Belgique (FR, NL, EN) et sans connotation religieuse. **Ce n’est pas que le combat d’une religion mais le combat de toute l’humanité. 🤝 
 
3)     S’opposer aux injustices que subit le peuple palestinien depuis 75 ans ne peut en aucun cas donner lieu de façon passive ou active à : une essentialisation de la communauté juive à la politique israélienne ; des raccourcis entre société israélienne et gouvernement israélien ; des messages, actes et discours antisémites. Tout ceci n’est pas acceptable et desservira toujours les perspectives d’union avec tous ceux qui pourraient être solidaires de cette cause.** Il y a de nombreux juifs qui soutiennent la cause palestinienne et nous devons les protéger et les couvrir d’amour.** 👏 
 
4) Dimanche, **jouons tous un rôle actif pour faire en sorte que tout le monde reste discipliné et qu’il n’y ait pas d’incidents. **Tout débordement à la manifestation sera utilisé contre nous et contre notre cause ! 💪 
 
5) **Partagez ce canal telegram et les visuels de la manif de dimanche (14h Schuman) en MASSE ! **🔥🔥🔥

Ce mercredi, les USA ont bloqué une résolution du conseil de sécurité de l’ONU 🇺🇳proposée par le Brésil 🇧🇷. Malgré son rejet, on peut dire qu’il y a une évolution positive avec la France 🇫🇷 a voté pour et que le Royaume-Uni 🇬🇧 s’est abstenu, probablement en grande partie grâce aux pressions des opinions publiques. C’est que la pression monte et paie. 

En attendant, vu la gravité des événements, on peut s’attendre à ce que ça ne s’arrête pas d’ici peu. Tonight, 10:30 pm at Place Bourse in Brussels. 
We mourn the victims of tonight's attack on a hospital in Gaza that left hundreds killed and a thousand wounded. Bring candles and we will sit down peacefully together in memory of the victims.

هاي الرسالة وصلتني، شير:

الليلة الساعة عشرة و نص بساحة البورس 
لحظة "حزن" على ضحايا قصف مشفى المعمدان 

Voici un message que je viens de recevoir : 

Ce soir, 22h30 place de la Bourse à Bruxelles.
Nous pleurons les victimes de l'attaque de ce soir contre un hôpital à Gaza, qui a fait des centaines de morts et un millier de blessés. Apportez des bougies et nous allons nous asseoir paisiblement ensemble en mémoire des victimes.

Hallo allemaal,

Ik neem aan dat jullie het vreselijke nieuws hebben gezien van de bombardementen op het ziekenhuis in Gaza, en op de school (gerund door de VN) die in de buurt als schuilplaats werd gebruikt 😞

Met de aanslag van gisteren in Brussel is het moreel nog lager. Maar we gaan ons verdriet omzetten in strijd ✊

We houden je hier op de hoogte van de acties. De "Boycot Axa" actie van vrijdag moest worden afgelast na onderhandelingen met de politie.

De demonstratie van morgen in Leuven gaat wel door, op het Martelarenplein om 17.30 uur, dus vertel het verder!

De demonstratie van zondag blijft een prioriteit. Alle nieuwe informatie zal hier worden doorgegeven.

Wat de aanslag van gisteren betreft: vertel je omgeving dat deze crimineel zei NIETS met Palestina te maken te hebben, en dat Islamitische Staat een groep is die niets te maken heeft met Hamas (en in feite een tegenstander op het terrein is). Laten we deze verwarring niet laten verspreiden.

Blijf de link delen https://t.me/PalestineSolidarityBelgium

Ik heb hier ook wat visuals geplaatst die je kunt gebruiken om het evenement onder de aandacht te brengen of om inhoud te delen.

Ik wens jullie veel sterkte ❤️

Salut tout le monde,

Je suppose que comme beaucoup vous avez vu les terribles nouvelles du bombardement de l’hôpital à Gaza, et de l’école (gérée par l’ONU) qui servait de refuge tout proche 😞

Avec l’attaque hier à Bruxelles, le moral est encore plus bas. Mais nous allons transformer notre peine en lutte!✊

On vous tient au courant ici des actions. L’action de vendredi “Boycott Axa” a dû être annulée après négociations avec la police.

Le rassemblement DEMAIN à Leuven est par contre maintenu, à Martelarenplein 17h30, à faire tourner dans vos contacts!

La manifestation de dimanche est A PRIORI maintenue. Toute info nouvelle passera ici.

Quand à l’attaque de hier: répétez autour de vous, ce criminel n’a RIEN revendiqué en rapport avec la Palestine, et l’Etat islamique est un groupe qui n’a rien à voir avec le Hamas (et même adversaires sur le terrain en réalité). Ne laissons pas passer l’amalgame.

Continuez à partager le lien https://t.me/PalestineSolidarityBelgium

Je mets aussi ici quelques visuels que vous pouvez utiliser pour diffuser les évènement, ou pour partager du contenu.

Force à toutes et tous ❤️

Hallo iedereen, 

Geconfronteerd met de verschrikkelijke beelden van de voortdurende bloedbaden in Gaza, vragen veel mensen zich af hoe ze kunnen helpen, hoe ze zich kunnen organiseren en hoe ze hun solidariteit kunnen tonen.

Op sociale media maken shadowbanning en andere technieken de inhoud van solidariteit met Palestina steeds minder zichtbaar, maar dat zal ons niet tegenhouden!

Dit kanaal zal de komende dagen en weken gebruikt worden om solidariteitsacties en evenementen in heel België uit te zenden.

Voorlopig:

1️⃣ Deel deze link zoveel mogelijk! In stories, in DM's, overal.

2️⃣ Boek alvast zondag 22/10, 14u in Brussel, NATIONALE solidariteitsbetoging met Gaza, tegen de massamoorden door het Israëlische leger. 

Meer info volgt, inclusief lokale acties in verschillende steden in het land 🙏

Hello tout le monde, 

Face aux images terribles des massacres en cours à Gaza, beaucoup de gens se demandent comment aider, comment s’organiser, comment montrer sa solidarité.

Sur les réseaux sociaux, le shadowban et d’autres techniques rendent les contenus de solidarité avec la Palestine de moins en moins visibles, mais ça ne nous arrêtera pas !

Ce canal va servir à diffuser les actions et évènements de solidarité à travers la Belgique, pour les jours et semaines à venir.

Pour l’instant :

1️⃣ Faire tourner ce lien un maximum ! Dans les story, en DM, partout.

2️⃣ Bloquez le dimanche 22/10, 14h à Bruxelles, rassemblement NATIONAL en solidarité avec Gaza, contre les massacres perpétrés par l’armée israélienne 

Plus d’info vont suivre notamment sur des actions locales dans différentes villes du pays 🙏

Sedikit tutor. Semoga dengan cara ini, channel tersebut bisa lebih cepat dibanned. Bagi yang butuh template bisa pake ini atau pake kalimat kalian sendiri juga boleh 🙏🏻

`Posts on this channel contain hate speech and acts of violence against victims of the ongoing genocide in Palestine, including mocking and abusing underage children. The content is deeply disturbing as it not only promotes violence but also dehumanizes the victims, exacerbating their suffering. Additionally, the channel contains speech and harassment targeting a particular religion, fostering intolerance and division among different communities. For these reasons, and considering the severe impact such content can have on individuals and society, I hope Telegram will take prompt and decisive action to permanently remove the channel and prevent the spread of such harmful content.`

Halo, saya mendapatkan informasi dari seseorang bahwa ada sebuah channel Telegram yang memposting dan mengolok-olok foto para korban di Palestina. Oleh karena itu, saya menghimbau kalian untuk menyebarkan kepada teman-teman kalian dan bersama-sama melaporkan (report) channel **@dead_terrorists** atas tindakan Violence. 

__**N**: Postingan di channel tersebut mengandung materi yang sensitif yang mungkin membuat beberapa penonton merasa tidak nyaman.__

After carefully considering the available information, would you still feel comfortable maintaining a neutral stance? Would you prefer to remain silent? You don’t have to be an activist, rescuer, or campaigner to make a difference. You just have to be human. In these times, silence is not the right choice. If they can’t scream for help, we will do it for them. 
"If Palestine dies, humanity dies." – Gustavo Petro.

Bagi yang ingin berbagi informasi seputar link donasi, silakan chat langsung ke @IStandWithPalestineBot. Saya akan menyusun daftarnya dan akan saya posting nanti malam untuk mempermudah bagi yang ingin berdonasi. Mohon pastikan lembaga yang menyelenggarakan donasi tersebut benar-benar terpercaya dan amanah.
Orang seperti itu ga perlu diladenin, cuma buang-buang waktu. Lebih baik langsung report supaya channelnya cepet hilang atau dibanned oleh telegram. Be smart, ya
Terkait channel ini, tolong banget ya teman-teman, langsung report aja, ga perlu ikutan comment atau sebagainya.

Ingat ya, di sini saya tidak memaksa atau mewajibkan kalian memberikan bantuan berupa donasi. Karena, setiap orang memiliki cara tersendiri untuk menunjukkan kepeduliannya. Saya hanya berbagi info bagi teman-teman yang memiliki rezeki lebih dan ingin berdonasi. Kalau belum bisa bantu donasi boleh luangkan waktu kalian dengan cara berdoa dan membantu menyuarakan hak warga Palestina di sosial media yang kalian punya.

Halo. Ada banyak yang memberitahukan saya lewat bot kalau ternyata pada bulan Maret 2024, baznas sempat memberikan bantuan kepada suatu komunitas berupa makanan yang kita tahu bahwa perusahaan makanan tersebut terafiliasi dengan Israel.
https://news.detik.com/berita/d-7264755/bareng-baznas-mcd-indonesia-bagikan-paket-berbuka-ke-komunitas-pemulung/amp

Katanya mereka juga pernah tersandung masalah korupsi zakat. 
https://x.com/gaongaoff/status/1796067763582026029?t=KyyS4cQOuRjsFVtBbCml5g&s=19

Di sini saya dan teman-teman yang lain hanya membantu memberikan informasi agar kalian bisa lebih berhati-hati dan lebih memilah jika ingin memberikan bantuan berupa donasi. Karena pastinya kita tidak ingin bantuan tersebut jatuh ke tangan yang tidak amanah 🙏🏻 Ada teman kita yang memberikan alternatif lain jika ingin berdonasi dan bisa melalui link di bawah ini.
https://kitabisa.com/campaign/celenganwargapalestina?utm_source=socialsharing_donor_web_null&utm_medium=share_campaign_copas&utm_campaign=share_detail_campaign
Temen-temen, kalo ada info boleh langsung ke bot ya 🙏🏻

Hati-hati juga kalau ingin berdonasi, menghindari jatuhnya donasi ke tangan yang salah. Pilih yang memang benar-benar donasinya itu disalurkan ke Palestine. Bukan bermaksud suudzon, tapi ga menutup kemungkinan ada oknum yang ingin mengambil kesempatan di situasi seperti ini. Semoga Allah melancarkan niat baik kita semua ❤️

**NOT ANOTHER NICKEL, NOT ANOTHER DIME, NO MORE MONEY FOR ISRAEL’S CRIMES!** 🇵🇸

We realize that the suffering you are experiencing is not something that can be ignored. Every cry for help, every tear that falls, is a call for all of us, to get up and do something. Because basic human rights, freedom and peace are the rights of every individual, regardless of race, religion or origin.

We are here, in a different part of the world, sending our prayers and support. Stand together in solidarity, Palestinians, that you are not alone. Hope still exists, because in every caring heart, there is a desire to see a better world, a world where children can play without fear, where families can gather without threats, and where peace is a reality, not just a dream .

Follow @eyeonpal on Telegram and @eye.on.palestine on Instagram to stay updated on what's happening in Palestine. Remember to share the posts so the whole world knows about it.

Berita-berita mengenai Palestina mungkin telah meredup karena adanya sorotan berita lain yang lebih dominan di media sosial. Namun, penting bagi kita untuk menghidupkan kembali perhatian terhadap isu Palestina dan memastikan informasi tersebut tetap terpantau. Mari bersama-sama ramaikan kembali pembicaraan dan kesadaran terhadap situasi di Palestina. #SharingIsCaring

Tolong jangan berhenti bersuara. Karena di dalam suara kita terdapat harapan yang tak terhingga bagi mereka yang berjuang. Mari kita bersatu untuk terus menyuarakan keadilan bagi rakyat Palestina yang telah lama menghadapi tantangan berat. Kita, sebagai individu, memiliki peran penting dalam menjadi suara bagi mereka yang mungkin tidak dapat bersuara sendiri. Majelis Ulama Indonesia (MUI) mengeluarkan fatwa baru terkait membeli produk dari produsen yang mendukung agresi Israel ke Palestina. 

Fatwa Nomor 83 Tahun 2023, berisi tentang Hukum Dukungan terhadap Palestina. Dalam Fatwa ini tertuang bahwa mendukung perjuangan kemerdekaan Palestina atas agresi Israel hukumnya wajib. Sebaliknya, mendukung Israel dan mendukung produk yang dukung Israel hukumnya haram.

Fatwa tersebut juga merekomendasikan agar pemerintah mengambil langkah-langkah tegas membantu perjuangan Palestina.

Ketua MUI Bidang Fatwa, Asrorun Niam Sholeh menegaskan, mendukung agresi Israel baik secara langsung maupun tidak langsung seperti membeli produk dari produsen yang secara nyata mendukung Israel haram hukumnya.

**Support Palestine. Boycott brands that support Israel.**

Taking a stance to support the Palestinian population by boycotting products that have ties to Israel is a form of peaceful protest and solidarity. This approach involves conscientiously refraining from purchasing or using goods and services from companies that have significant financial or political connections to Israel. The idea behind this strategy is to exert economic pressure on entities that may indirectly or directly contribute to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict. While it's important to remember that individual consumer choices alone may not resolve the complex geopolitical issues at play, some individuals and organizations choose to engage in such boycotts as a way to raise awareness, express their political views, and advocate for change. It's worth noting that the effectiveness and ethical implications of such actions are subjects of debate, and people should consider the broader context and consequences of their choices.

"**You don't have to be Muslim to stand up for Palestine, you just have to be human**."

Support for the Palestinian cause is not limited to any specific religion; it's a matter of human rights and compassion. It is heartening to see people from various walks of life, regardless of their faith or nationality, come together in solidarity with the Palestinian people, seeking a fair and peaceful resolution to the long-standing conflict in the region. Therefore, I encourage you to join this global movement and extend your support to the people of Palestine, who have endured immense challenges for far too long. 📚 **New edition of our book — all type-os finally ironed out**

As I was reading aloud my book to my baby daughter, I cringed at how many type-os and mistakes I missed.

Each chapter, I would find many, fix them, then upload the updated manuscript into our print-on-demand service (which they charged money for every time since the book was on their listing for longer than two months). So I decided to stop uploading corrected manuscripts after each chapter, and poured through the entire book from front to back until I got every type-o.

For those who bought prior editions, there is no worry, they are not super major errors that would warrant you needing to buy it again, we just want to  make sure we adhere to quality standards for future orders.

Our book is available here and ships worldwide. https://basirapress.org/shop/books/firmest-handle-book/

Film ini pertama kali tayang di Indonesia tanggal 1 Juli 2000. Children of Heaven berkisah tentang kakak-beradik bernama Ali dan Zahra yang terlahir dari keluarga miskin.

Mereka harus saling bergantian memakai sepatu tiap ke sekolah dikarenakan sepatu Zahra hilang oleh Ali ketika ia sedang menghutang sayuran di pasar.

Sepatu Zahra sebenarnya sudah sangat butut dan jebol. Tapi karena orangtua mereka belum punya uang, akhirnya mereka memutuskan untuk mensol sepatu Zahra agar dapat digunakan lagi.

Saat itu Ali disuruh mengambil sepatu tersebut di tukang sol. Tapi Ali malah kehilangan sepatu Zahra yang ia letakkan di luar, tepatnya di dekat ranjang sayuran. Padahal seorang pemulung telah mengambilnya karena berpikir sepatu itu sudah tidak dipakai (mungkin saking bututnya).

Ali pun mencarinya kemana-mana tapi tidak ketemu jua. Sampai akhirnya dia terpaksa bilang pada Zahra bahwa sepatunya hilang. Zahra pun sedih karena itu adalah sepatu dia satu-satunya untuk ke sekolah besok.

Ali tak tega melihat adiknya menangis dan ia merasa bersalah sekali. Akhirnya ia pun memutuskan untuk meminjamkan sepatunya untuk dipakai Zahra ke sekolah. Padahal Ali juga hanya punya satu sepasang sepatu, itupun sudah agak butut.

Mereka pun akhirnya harus saling bergantian memakai sepatu tersebut. Zahra yang masuk sekolah di pagi hari harus berlari cepat saat pulang sekolah agar Ali dapat segera memakai sepatu saat Ali hendak berangkat sekolah di siang harinya, selisih waktu sekolah antara mereka tidak terlalu banyak sehingga mereka harus saling berlari agar tepat waktu.

Karena hal itu, Ali jadi sering terlambat datang ke sekolah sehingga ia kerap dimarahi oleh salah satu gurunya. Padahal segitu ia sudah berlari sangat cepat.

Sampai akhirnya Ali mengikuti perlombaan lari jarak jauh di sekolahnya dan berharap mendapat juara ketiga. Kenapa ketiga?

Karena hadiah juara ketiga itu adalah sepasang sepatu olahraga. Tapi sayang, Ali malah jadi juara pertama pada perlombaan itu. Bukannya senang, tapi Ali justru sedih karena tidak mampu menepati janjinya kepada Zahra untuk jadi juara ketiga.

Walau ceritanya sangat sederhana, namun film ini sangat sarat akan pesan moralnya. Kehidupan anak- anak miskin di Iran begitu tergambar jelas dalam film karya Majid Majidi ini.

Selain itu, film yang juga tayang di AS dan beberapa negara Asia Timur lainnya ini juga selalu berhasil membuat siapapun yang menontonnya menitikkan air mata.


segera memakai sepatu saat Ali hendak berangkat sekolah di siang harinya, selisih waktu sekolah antara mereka tidak terlalu banyak sehingga mereka harus saling berlari agar tepat waktu.

Walau ceritanya sangat sederhana, namun film ini sangat sarat akan pesan moralnya. Kehidupan anak- anak miskin di Iran begitu tergambar jelas dalam film karya Majid Majidi ini.

Selain itu, film yang juga tayang di AS dan beberapa negara Asia Timur lainnya ini juga selalu berhasil membuat siapapun yang menontonnya menitikkan air mata.

Banyak nilai yang dapat kita ambil dari film ini, betapa penuh dengan nilai tanggung jawab atas kesalahan yang sudah diperbuat, tidak mengeluh pada tiap keadaan, gigih dalam mencapai tujuan, dan juga mengajarkan harmonisasi antar umat beragama. Sungguh, film yang sangat bermartabat.

A letter written by an Israeli captive to Al-Qassam Brigades hours before leaving the Gaza Strip.

To the generals who have accompanied me in recent weeks, it seems we will part ways tomorrow, but I thank you from the bottom of my heart for the extraordinary humanity shown towards my daughter, Emilia. You were like parents to her, letting her go into your rooms whenever she wanted. She’s admitted that she feels like all of you are her friends, and not just friends, but truly beloved and good people. 

Thank you, thank you, thank you for the many hours you spent as caregivers. Thank you for being patient with her and showering her with sweets, fruits, and everything available even when you didn’t have it. 

Children should not be held in captivity, but thanks to you and other kind people we met along the way, my daughter felt like a queen in Gaza... In general, she says she felt as though she was the center of the world. She hasn't met anyone on our long journey, from the rank and file to the leadership, who didn't treat her with gentleness, affection, and love. 

I will forever be a prisoner of gratitude because she did not leave here with a lifelong psychological trauma. I will remember your kind behavior, granted here despite the difficult situation you were dealing with yourselves and the severe losses you suffered here in Gaza. I wish in this world we could truly be good friends. 

I wish you all health and well-being... Health and love to you and your families' children. Many thanks. 

Danyal and Emilia
Nov 27, 2023

Surat yang ditulis oleh seorang tawanan Israel kepada Brigade Al-Qassam beberapa jam sebelum meninggalkan Jalur Gaza.

 Kepada para jenderal yang telah mendampingi saya dalam beberapa minggu terakhir, sepertinya kita akan berpisah besok, namun saya berterima kasih dari lubuk hati yang terdalam atas rasa kemanusiaan luar biasa yang ditunjukkan terhadap putri saya, Emilia.  Anda seperti orang tua baginya, membiarkan dia masuk ke kamar Anda kapan pun dia mau.  Dia mengakui bahwa dia merasa kalian semua adalah temannya, dan bukan hanya temannya, tapi orang yang benar-benar dicintai dan baik.

 Terima kasih, terima kasih, terima kasih atas banyak waktu yang Anda habiskan sebagai pengasuh.  Terima kasih telah bersabar padanya dan menghujaninya dengan permen, buah-buahan, dan segala sesuatu yang tersedia bahkan saat Anda tidak memilikinya.

 Anak-anak tidak boleh ditahan, namun terima kasih kepada Anda dan orang-orang baik lainnya yang kami temui selama ini, putri saya merasa seperti seorang ratu di Gaza... Secara umum, dia mengatakan dia merasa seolah-olah dia adalah pusat dunia.  Dia belum pernah bertemu siapa pun dalam perjalanan panjang kami, mulai dari pangkat hingga pimpinan, yang tidak memperlakukannya dengan kelembutan, kasih sayang, dan cinta.

 Saya akan selamanya menjadi tawanan rasa syukur karena dia tidak meninggalkan sini dengan trauma psikologis seumur hidup.  Saya akan mengingat perilaku baik Anda, yang diberikan di sini meskipun Anda menghadapi situasi sulit dan kerugian besar yang Anda derita di sini di Gaza.  Saya berharap di dunia ini kita benar-benar bisa menjadi teman baik.

 Saya berharap Anda semua sehat dan sejahtera... Kesehatan dan cinta untuk Anda dan anak-anak keluarga Anda.  Terimakasih banyak.

 Danial dan Emilia
 27 November 2023

 Sebelum kamu lahir, kamu tumbuh dalam kehangatan, pelukan dan belas kasihan ibumu.  Rasa sakit dan kesabaran yang ibumu lalui untuk mengandung dan membesarkanmu, memberinya imbalan berupa Jannah di bawah kakinya.  Itulah sebabnya, dalam Islam, jika ada orang di dunia ini yang paling layak menerima kebaikanmu, maka orang itu adalah ibumu.

 Allah (swt) mempunyai banyak sifat, dua di antaranya adalah

 الرحمن- 𝐀𝐫 𝐑𝐚𝐡𝐦𝐚𝐧 (𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐌𝐨𝐬𝐭 𝐌𝐞𝐫𝐜𝐢𝐟𝐮𝐥)

 الرحيم 𝐀𝐫 𝐑𝐚𝐡𝐞𝐞𝐦 (𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐛𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐫 𝐨𝐟 𝐌𝐞𝐫𝐜𝐲, ()

 Allah SWT telah memuliakan dan menganugerahkan derajat ini kepada para ibu.  Dia bahkan memilih untuk berbagi dua atributnya dengan kata rahim.  Mengetahui sepenuhnya bahwa hal terdekat yang akan Anda alami untuk merasakan belas kasihan, dalam bentuknya yang paling murni, di dunia ini, adalah melalui ibu Anda.

 Maka anak Gaza tersayang, meski kehangatan tubuhmu telah lepas dari pelukan ibumu, dan kami masih berduka atasmu, kami tahu bahwa kamu telah diambil dari rahmat dunia ini, namun temukanlah kenyamanan mengetahui bahwa kamu telah dipertemukan kembali.  dengan Yang Maha Penyayang.

Dan atas kesabaran ibumu, kami berdoa agar surga di bawah kaki mereka untuk selamanya.

Para anggota Hamas disebutkan berkomunikasi dengan cara yang sama sekali kuno dan menghindari teknologi modern saat ini. Yakni melalui jaringan telepon kabel dibangun dalam sebuah terowongan di bawah Gaza.


Komunikasi dilakukan selama dua tahun itu. Selama waktu tersebut, mereka melakukan komunikasi dan merencanakan operasi serta memanggil ratusan anggotanya. Namun tak ada sama sekali pergerakan selama periode tersebut hingga serangan dilancarkan pada 7 Oktober 2023 lalu.


Dalam laporan tersebut disebutkan pula Hamas juga berhasil lolos dari deteksi AS dan Israel dengan menghindari penggunaan komputer maupun ponsel. Para anggota hanya melakukan komunikasi pada area yang sudah ditentukan saja.

“Tidak banyak diskusi dan bolak-balik serta koordinasi di luar area terdekat,” kata salah satu sumber, dikutip dari CNN (30/10/2023).

Kantor Direktur Intelijen Nasional AS menolak berkomentar dan kedutaan Israel di Washington tidak menanggapi permintaan komentar.

Pihak intelijen AS dan Israel sebenarnya telah mendapatkan peringatan strategis. Namun kedua pihak tidak bisa mengantisipasi serangan 7 Oktober tersebut.


Sebagai informasi, terowongan tersebut dibangun Gaza selama lima belas tahun terakhir. Pihak pasukan pertahanan Israel menyebutnya sebagai ‘metro Gaza’.

Jaringan terowongan membentuk sebuah labirin luas. Di dalamnya menjadi tempat menyimpan seperti roket dan amunisi serta cara para militan untuk bergerak tanpa diketahui lawan.

Menurut pasukan Israel, metro Gaza juga menjadi tempat pusat komando dan juga kendali penting yang dilakukan oleh Hamas.

Pengerahan militer Amerika dan Barat dalam jumlah besar di wilayah tersebut untuk mengantisipasi perluasan “Perang Gaza” serta eskalasi perang regional.Amerika, Inggris, Spanyol, Belanda, dan Jerman pesawat kargo mengangkut sejumlah besar senjata dan amunisi ke Israel, dan lainnya mengangkut banyak pasukan ke negara-negara di Timur Tengah, dan pasukan Amerika di dekat Iran.

**Today's appointment with freedom for Fatima al-Arouri, Dalal al-Arouri and Alaa Saqr al-Arouri! **

On the 21st of November, Alaa Saqr Al-Arouri, a student at Al-Quds University, from Ramallah, in the occupied West Bank, was kidnapped by the occupation as she was leaving the blessed Al-Aqsa Mosque. 

Alaa is the daughter of Fatima Al-Arouri, 47, and the niece of Dalal Al-Arouri, 52. They are the sisters of Saleh Al-Arouri, prominent leader of the Hamas Islamic Resistance Movement in the West Bank and outside Palestine. 

Both women have been imprisoned since January 2024, after they were kidnapped from their homes in Ramallah, during West Bank raids by invading US-sponsored Zionist occupation forces, days after the assassination of their brother in Lebanon by occupation forces.

A few days before his sister's arrest, on January 2nd, Saleh Al-Arouri and 6 others were martyred by the occupation in a drone strike in a suburb of Beirut. Saleh had been deported from Palestine by the occupation in 2010 and, after many relocations, he settled in Lebanon in 2015. 

After her brother's martyrdom, right before being arrested, Dalal gave an interview in which she said: "There is a reason for everything. The assassination of Saleh will not deter the Palestinian people from their struggle and will not break the resistance. New leaders will emerge.", continuing with: "[...]his blood, like the blood of the rest of the martyrs, is not more precious than the blood of the people of Gaza."

Today, Alaa, Fatima and Dalal are liberated by the Resistance in Toufan al-Ahrar!

Among the prisoners who will be released today are 61-year-old PFLP leader [Khalida Jarrar](https://t.me/PalestineResist/68163), who was held in solitary confinement for months after her [abduction in January 2024](https://t.me/PalestineResist/25962); 18-year-old [Zeina Barbar](https://t.me/RNN_Prisoners/1564), whose sentence was extended just days ago; [Wilaa Tanaja](https://t.me/RNN_Prisoners/845), who was [freed](https://t.me/PalestineResist/20801) in the November 2023 exchanges and then rearrested.

Each day in the Flood of the Free will see new lists of prisoners to be freed, starting with prioritizing women and child prisoners.

THE FLOOD OF THE FREE: The march to liberation

This morning, as the sun rises in Gaza, as the people of the north return home without anyone searching or interrogating them, in preparation for a greater march home to all of occupied Palestine and their original homes and lands, as Jabalia camp is filled with its people and families, from the heroic resistance fighters that made the camp a death trap for the genocidal enemy until its last moment, as the doctors, nurses and health workers reopen the hospitals, as the Palestinian police, interior ministry and civil defense — so heavily targeted by the occupier — fan out throughout Gaza, Palestinian prisoners inside the occupation jails are awaiting their liberation in the exchange agreement, Toufan al-Ahrar, the Flood of the Free — liberated by the Palestinian resistance and the great sacrifices of Gaza, accompanied by those throughout Palestine, of Lebanon, Yemen, Iran and Iraq.

The occupation has released a list of names of the prisoners to be liberated within the first stage of the agreement, a process that will take place over 42 days. This is not the entire reach of the Flood of the Free; especially as many of the leadership prisoners and those with high sentences are expected to be demanded to be released in the second stage of the exchange, in return for high-ranking Zionist captives held by the resistance. 

The names on the list published by the occupation are exciting and inspiring, including so many of the great leaders of the Palestinian liberation struggle; three of the heroes of the Freedom Tunnel; Nael Barghouthi, the longest-held Palestinian prisoner; Mohammed Abu Warda, with 45 life sentences; Khalida Jarrar, the leading Palestinian academic and leftist; Ammar al-Zaben, the first Palestinian prisoner to conceive a child through "smuggled sperm;" Dirar al-Sisi, the Palestinian engineer kidnapped from Ukraine in 2011; Hadeel Shatara, the Palestinian educator and activist;  Iyad Jaradat, who endured years in solitary confinement; Wael Jaghoub, the Palestinian leader and writer behind bars; Bushra al-Taweel, the tireless chronicler of the Palestinian prisoners' cause; the ill strugglers like Moatassem Raddad and Mansour Muqtada; Abla Sa'adat, the wife of Ahmad Sa'adat — and so many more. 

However, we also know that the exchange will be completed in stages and throughout the 42 days, and that the Resistance — the great Resistance that achieved their liberation — is the only trustworthy source of information, and will be coordinating the release of the lists of names of prisoners to be exchanged each day of the releases. 

We will provide immediate translations and information as soon as they are available on an ongoing basis. 

1,737 male and female prisoners will be released from Israeli occupation prisons by the Resistance as part of the FIRST PHASE ONLY of the Flood of the Free. 

We urge everyone, around the world, to join with the Palestinian people in Gaza and everywhere, to celebrate the achievements of the Resistance and the humiliation of the occupier, and to celebrate and welcome each liberated prisoner as the heroes of our global movement that they are, in public events, with posters and public education, with actions and events exposing Zionism and imperialism everywhere. Receive the prisoners virtually and symbolically — and pledge to continue the movement until all of them are free, and all of Palestine is free, from the river to the sea.

Good morning, Gaza. 

It's Sunday, January 19th 2025. The clock strikes 8:30 AM. The sun of October 8th is shining now and time just started moving again. 

Good morning, Gaza. 

Peace be upon your people. Peace be upon your wounds. Peace be upon the empty stomachs. Peace be upon the bones scattered in the streets, waiting to be buried. 

A salute of gratitude to your heroes:
To the doctors, the nurses, the medical personnel who never abandoned their duties, working day and night in the most inhumane conditions to stitch, mend, and heal. Those who saw hospitals turned into battlefields —fought, burned, and bombed— becoming the most dangerous places in Gaza, yet refused to leave. 

Salutations to the journalists who raised their voices above the thunder of bombings, until the genocide claimed 205 of their own. They remained in the field, unphased, undeterred, committed to spreading the truth.

To the civil defense teams who pulled survivors from beneath the rubble for 15 long months with their bare hands. Whose ambulances were targeted, shot, and bombed, but never stopped. 

To the mothers of Gaza: we kiss the hands that cooked, held their loved ones, wiped away tears and blood, and rose in the cold of the night to murmur prayers—or scream them—until this day.

To our fathers, brothers, and sons who fought and wrote with their blood the most historic epics of our time. Who held the tents from flying in the cold winter, and put out fires when hospital courtyards were bombed. 

Fifteen months have passed. 

Good morning, Gaza. Good morning, soul of our soul.
I promise to dedicate the rest of my life to serve until your freedom.

Peace be upon the resistance that fought until victory. Peace be upon our blood spilled from South Lebanon to Jenin, from Iraq, Iran, and Yemen to you, Gaza—to your shores. 

The war may end today, but the fight is far from over. We will return. We will rebuild. We will heal. 

We will continue to tell the world the story of this small region that woke us on a Saturday morning to demand freedom for prisoners in colonial jails. The [Flood](https://t.me/PalestineResist/13228) which swept away all the world’s forces of evil who gathered to stifle a cry of freedom. Gaza, who fought on the behalf of humanity, with all that is good, against all that is evil. 

We are one step closer to liberation. 

Glory to the martyrs. 
Healing to the wounded. 
Freedom to our prisoners.

🚨 Once again, Jenin, the Wasps' nest, resists until victory: 

Yesterday night, after 44 days of confrontation, Jenin Brigade and the Palestinian Authority have reached an agreement to end the siege on the camp.

The agreement includes:
1- Halting the pursuit of resistance fighters and refraining from interfering with their weapons, in addition to releasing detainees.
2- Allowing police forces to operate within the camp's perimeter.
3- Rebuilding homes destroyed during the 44-day siege. 

The reconciliation committee and key figures behind the initiative will oversee the implementation of the agreed-upon arrangements.

The Jenin Brigade affirmed its commitment to the agreement, provided the Authority adheres to its obligations. 

The camp celebrated with young men chanting as police entered Jenin Refugee Camp Square: 
**__"The camp is victorious!"__**

Some of them held a PA officer on their shoulders while chanting for Jenin Brigade. 

Gaza was also present in the celebrations, with the youth reiterating unwavering support: 
**__"From the camp, greetings to our steadfast Gaza."
"We are the men of Mohammed Deif!"__**

🚨 **Key Points from the Palestinian Factions' Meeting in Doha**:
—
Leaders of Palestinian factions convened in Doha to bless the ceasefire and exchange agreement signed by Hamas. Hamas leader Mohammed Darwish led the meeting, emphasizing that Hamas' "hands are extended for unity, anytime and anywhere" in a message directed to Fatah as part of Hamas' push for a national unity government that [Fatah has rejected. ](https://t.me/PalestineResist/70762)

**Invitation by Hamas:**

Palestinian factions and forces convened in Doha at Hamas’ invitation to discuss the implementation of the ceasefire agreement and prisoner exchange brokered by Qatar and Egypt.

**Attendees:**
- Hamas delegation led by senior leader Mohammed Darwish, head of the leadership council.
- Islamic Jihad delegation led by Secretary-General Ziad Al-Nakhaleh.
- Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine (PFLP) led by Deputy Secretary-General Jamil Mezher.
- Democratic Front for the Liberation of Palestine (DFLP) led by Deputy Secretary-General Majida Al-Masri.
- Palestinian National Initiative led by Secretary-General Mustafa Barghouti.
- Popular Front-General Command led by political bureau member Ramez Mustafa.
- Palestinian People’s Party led by Shamikh Abu Sakhr.
- Prisoners Affairs Authority led by its head Qadura Fares.

**Opening Remarks by Mohammed Darwish:
**- Paid tribute to the martyrs of the Al-Aqsa Flood and prayed for the recovery of the wounded.
- Described the Al-Aqsa Flood and the genocidal war as a turning point in the Palestinian cause.
- Called for unity to face the dangers threatening the cause and added: "I address our brothers in the Fatah movement and other factions, saying that our hands are extended for unity at any time and in any place."
- Suggested forming a national unity government, and if not feasible, proposed managing Gaza collectively to address reconstruction and humanitarian needs.
- Affirmed the Palestinian people’s steadfastness and their commitment to liberating the homeland and Al-Aqsa Mosque.

**Details of the Ceasefire Agreement:**
- Khalil Al-Hayya, head of Hamas’ negotiating team, detailed the terms and mechanisms of the agreement.

**Statements from Participating Factions:**
- Stressed the importance of safeguarding this national achievement, which was made possible by the sacrifices of the Palestinian people. This steadfastness led to the imposition of a halt to aggression and the genocide against our people. They praised the role and efforts of the Hamas movement in leading the battle on the ground and in negotiations. 
- Called for maintaining Palestinian national unity and forming a national unity government as per the recent Beijing Agreement. Until this is achieved, they affirmed that the day after the end of the aggression remains a matter of internal Palestinian affairs.
- Highlighted the urgent need of expediting the process of aiding our afflicted people in the Gaza Strip, providing all necessary resources for emergency shelter, relief, and the reconstruction process.

**Tributes and Acknowledgments:
**- Saluted the military wings of Palestinian resistance factions for their courageous defense.
- Expressed gratitude to resistance allies, particularly in Lebanon, Yemen, Iran, Iraq, and others who supported the Palestinian cause.
- Extended special thanks to Qatar and Egypt for their mediation efforts.

**Commitment to Resistance:**
- Reaffirmed the Palestinian people's right to resist the occupation until liberation, return, and independence are achieved.

🚨 Important statement issued by the Prisoners Media Office:
—
**Mechanism for the Release of Prisoners in the First Phase of the Exchange Deal**

According to Riyad Al-Ashqar, Director of the Palestine Center for Prisoners Studies:

**Gradual Release, Not All at Once:**
- The prisoners will not be released in a single wave. 
- Although the occupation has published lists of their names on the Prison Authority's website (a routine procedure to allow for objections), the process will not occur simultaneously.

**Implementation in Several Batches:**
- The release will take place over 4-6 weeks.
- Each week, a new batch of prisoners will be freed.
The full number will be completed within 42 days, unless the duration is shortened through efforts by mediators.

**Negotiations Are Ongoing:**
- The second phase of the deal will be negotiated during this period.
- It will involve identifying new names and numbers of detainees to be released in exchange for occupation captives.

**The Palestinian Government in Gaza Announces Readiness to Implement a Comprehensive Plan to Gradually Restore Life Following the Ceasefire, Led by Police and Municipalities. **

The Palestinian government in Gaza announces the completion of a comprehensive plan to address the ceasefire agreement, which will come into effect tomorrow, Sunday. The plan includes urgent field measures to ensure the gradual return of normal life, including securing affected areas and providing humanitarian aid to citizens.

Specialized government teams from ministries and governmental institutions have been prepared to monitor the implementation of this plan on the ground, ensuring the safety of citizens and striving to meet their basic needs.

The Palestinian government affirms the readiness of ministries and governmental institutions to execute this plan. At the forefront of its implementation will be the Palestinian Police, municipalities, and field monitoring teams. The police will be responsible for maintaining security and order across the various governorates, while municipalities will oversee tasks such as reopening roads, clearing debris in affected areas, repairing water networks, and restoring infrastructure. Other government teams from various ministries will work closely on the ground to ensure all measures are implemented and to facilitate the swift restoration of normalcy.

🚨 **Palestinian Prisoners Center: Details of the First Phase of the Prisoner Exchange Deal**
**__
The first phase of the prisoner exchange deal agreed upon between the resistance in Gaza and the occupation includes the release of more than half of the prisoners sentenced to life imprisonment.__**

**Specifics of the First Phase:**
- The first phase will include the release of 600 prisoners, all of whom have sentences exceeding 15 years.
- Among them, approximately 290 prisoners are serving life sentences, representing about half of the 566 prisoners sentenced to life in occupation prisons.

**Veteran Prisoners:**
- The release will include 21 veteran prisoners detained before the Oslo Accords, who have spent decades in occupation prisons or serving life sentences. 
- The shortest-serving among them has completed 30 consecutive years of imprisonment.
- These prisoners will have priority for release in the deal.

**Freed Prisoners Re-Arrested:**
- The first phase will also include 47 prisoners released in the 2011 Wafaa Al-Ahrar Deal but re-arrested by the occupation.
- Among them are veteran prisoners who had served decades behind bars before their previous release.
- Many were sentenced again to life imprisonment.

**Women, Children, and Vulnerable Groups:
**- The first phase will secure the release of all 85 female prisoners from across all regions.
- It will include all minors, numbering over 340 children.
- A number of elderly prisoners and those suffering from severe illnesses will also be released.

**Prisoners from Gaza, the West Bank, Al-Quds, and Palestinian lands occupied in 1948:**
- The phase will include prisoners with high sentences from all regions, including Gaza, the West Bank, Al-Quds, and inside 1948-occupied lands.
- Additionally, 1,000 prisoners from Gaza arrested during the genocide war on the strip will be released, out of a total of more than 3,000 prisoners still detained from Gaza.

**The Importance of the Deal:**

**- The deal is significant not only for the large numbers of prisoners to be released but also for the caliber of prisoners included.**

**Priority will be given to approximately 1,500 prisoners, including:**
- Veteran prisoners and those with high sentences who have spent many years behind bars.
- 539 "deans of prisoners" who have served over 20 consecutive years in prison.
- 43 prisoners who have been detained for more than 25 years.
- 21 prisoners held for over 30 years, including the oldest prisoner, Mohammed Al-Tous from Al-Khalil, who has been imprisoned since October 1985.

**A Historic Exchange:**
**- The deal, if completed as planned, will be the most significant prisoner exchange in history, executed by the Palestinian resistance despite the occupation’s opposition.
- It will include prisoners who were previously impossible to release in earlier deals nor through the goodwill agreements facilitated by the Palestinian Authority in 2013.**

The Prisonersx Authority and The Prisoners' Club noted that we received the news of Akka's martyrdom through the General Authority for Civil Affairs, while the family of the martyr Al-Kahlout received the news of his martyrdom through the Hamoked Foundation, the martyr Al-Sharif through a private lawyer who obtained a paper proving his martyrdom in Ramla Prison, and the martyr Labad through the Hamoked Foundation. 

The Prisoners' Authority and The Prisoners' Club stated that all of these responses received by the various institutions were obtained from the occupation army or the occupation prison administration, and we confirm that this is the only available way to reveal the fate of the Gaza detainees that was made possible by the legal amendments. 

The Prisoners' Authority and The Prisoners' Club explained that the martyr Akka was arrested on 11/15/2023 during his displacement from northern Gaza to the south. Statement to the Palestinian people regarding the practices of the Authority in Jenin.

⚫️ Issued by the Islamic Jihad Movement in Palestine:

Based on the firm positions and solid principles upon which the Islamic Jihad Movement in Palestine was founded, and which it has adhered to throughout its journey, and which everyone near and far testifies that it has never deviated from,

In light of the unjust campaign targeting our movement, its cadres and symbols, with the aim of provoking it and dragging it into a cycle of rejected internal fighting,
And based on our deep concern to abide by the will of our Palestinian people, as the owner of legitimacy and the final decision, we present to Palestinian public opinion the following facts:

Since the launch of the security campaign carried out by the Authority's security forces in the Jenin camp, our movement has been subjected to a systematic media campaign aimed at distorting its path, casting doubt on its national affiliation, and denying its honorable history and great sacrifices. This campaign has reached the level of personal attacks on the movement's leaders and symbols. Despite all this, we affirm our adherence to refusing to be dragged into internal strife, not out of weakness or inability, but rather out of commitment to our principles, to preserve the blood of our people, and in appreciation of the sacrifices of the martyrs, wounded, and prisoners. We are fully aware that these provocations aim to drag us into the quagmire of strife, which we will not enter.

Our brothers and sons in the Jenin Brigade have also been subjected, for weeks, to a fierce campaign of arrests, pursuits, and shooting, amidst a media and security siege aimed at undermining their resolve. These practices aim to push us into internal conflict, which only serves the zionist occupation that incites strife, aiming to portray our Palestinian people as being in a state of internal fighting, to pass its narrative and justify its crimes against Gaza before the world.

From the first moment, we took the initiative to put forward numerous initiatives and mediations with the aim of sparing our people the scourge of strife and stopping the bloodshed. Despite our keenness to prevail wisdom, all these initiatives were thwarted, and the doors were closed to all peaceful solutions.

Events have taken a dangerous turn with the escalation of campaigns of repression and abuse practiced by the authorities against citizens who express their opinions rejecting sedition. These practices, which aim to silence voices calling for wisdom and reason, constitute a flagrant violation of freedom of expression and contradict the sanctity of Palestinian blood.

Based on the above, we emphasize the following:
1 - We demand that the Palestinian Authority immediately stop its security and media campaigns, lift the siege on Jenin camp, end the persecution of resistance fighters, and stop the abuse of citizens.
2 - We commend the positions of our brothers in the Palestinian forces and factions who presented initiatives to lift the siege on Jenin and the efforts and endeavors they made to quell the strife and stop the bloodshed of our people, and to thwart the occupation, and we call on them to redouble their efforts.
3 - We call on our brothers in the Fatah movement, with whom we share the path of struggle and resistance, to intervene urgently to stop the voices that insult their honorable history of struggle, and to redirect the compass towards our national unity.
4 - We appeal to the dignitaries and national leaders, from various political and societal movements, to play their role in protecting Palestinian blood and working to find a way out that preserves the unity of our people.
As we address our people, we renew our firm commitment to preserving our national unity and our absolute rejection of all forms of sedition that serve the occupation alone.**

HTS, formerly known as Al-Qaeda’s Nusra Front, was responsible for the killing and kidnapping of Lebanese army soldiers during the first years of the war in Syria. __Al-Akhbar report 
 
__The war’s toll on Israel’s northern regions has become a staggering economic burden. With damages exceeding 5 billion shekels ($1.35 billion), the Israeli Tax Authority warns that the figure will only climb without a ceasefire agreement with Lebanon. Direct damage to homes, factories, and infrastructure totals 1.5 billion shekels, while indirect losses—shuttered businesses, halted agriculture, and declining incomes—reach 4 billion shekels, with agriculture and tourism hardest hit. 
 
Factories near the border are closed, and major shipping disruptions have choked supply chains, crippling production. Even in areas farther from the frontlines, workforces have dwindled, operating at barely 50% capacity as missile strikes and sirens disrupt daily life. Over 27 settlements have ceased operations entirely, following Hezbollah's evacuation warnings three weeks ago. 
 
In a blow to Israel's defense industry, precision strikes by Hezbollah drones forced the closure of key military factories, including facilities belonging to "B.A.T" and "Rafael". These attacks have led to layoffs, factory relocations, and the evacuation of sensitive military sites. The once-bustling real estate market has collapsed, with plummeting demand and over 12,000 families displaced, many now facing up to 18 months in temporary housing.  
 
Interviews with Israeli business owners impacted in the northern regions under occupation emphasized their recognition of the "need for joint cooperation with the Arab community" in these areas. These regions are home to over two million people, including approximately 850,000 Arabs who form a vital part of the business and production sectors and a significant consumer base. 
 
The war’s shadow continues to freeze reconstruction, deepen unemployment, and strain resources, threatening to lock the northern economy in paralysis for the foreseeable future.

🚨 **__The Situation of the Female Prisoners as reported by __**[**__"Qadeyah"__**](https://t.me/qadeyah/13729)**__ and translated by RNN:__**
**—**
Since the beginning of the aggression, the female prisoners have endured compounded suffering due to the escalation of abuse and the denial of their most basic rights by the prison administration. This is in addition to the exploitation of their cases by some lawyers who have profited from them, whether by taking on their representation or facilitating visits.

**The current situation summarized:**

**- One change of clothing per prisoner:** The prison administration bargained with the prisoners by offering them a single winter outfit in exchange for confiscating their summer clothing. The outfit is of poor-quality fabric, shrinking with washing and fraying easily. Even a "half needle"—a broken needle the prisoners used to mend their clothing—was confiscated during one of last month's raids.

**- Scarce and poor-quality food:** The administration continues to provide food that is both insufficient in quantity and substandard in quality, leading to issues such as constipation and hormonal imbalances among the prisoners.

**- Sick prisoners without proper treatment:** The unbearable conditions of imprisonment for a healthy detainee are doubly harsh for those suffering from illnesses. There is no doctor to treat them nor appropriate medication. The jailers deliberately replace proper treatment with a single "Acamol" pill or sedative injections.

**- Punishment for the simplest acts:** The prison administration punishes prisoners for minor actions such as delays in using the bathroom or even for laughing together as they try to lift their spirits through conversation or games. Punishments include being denied outdoor time for days, cell raids, strip searches, beatings, and confiscation of the few possessions they have left in their rooms.

**- Deprived of cleaning supplies:** There is no laundry detergent available, only dish soap. They have had no nail clippers for nearly a month, and only one comb is available in the entire section. Some prisoners are now suffering from fungal infections on their skin and scalp due to these conditions.

**- Exploitation by lawyers:** Since the beginning of the aggression and the suspension of family visits, some lawyers have exploited families by charging exorbitant amounts to facilitate visits with the prisoners. This is compounded by the poor treatment of some lawyers and their failure to deliver even simple messages between the prisoners and their families.

The suffering is indescribable, and the conditions are unbearable. **Yet, the prisoners, as one witness says, "are incredibly strong." They draw their strength from their closeness to Allah, filling their days with prayer, recitation of the Quran, and fasting. They remain resilient, but this does not absolve every one of their duty to advocate for and support them.**

Behind these walls, our women have been stripped of their freedom.
In the midst of silence and oppression, Palestinian female prisoners bear their suffering and pave the way for our freedom

From within the depths of prison, Palestinian women’s stories of strength and resilience unfold amidst their endurance of the harshest forms of torture and deprivation. 

Among them wounded women, children, and mothers deprived of their children. Palestinian prisoners endure unbearable suffering from the moment they are detained until their very last moment in prison. The suffering isn’t confined within the occupation’s prisons; on the contrary, the effects of the excruciating physical and mental torture remain with the freed prisoners long after their release.

Consistent violations of their freedoms and sanctities, as the occupation forcibly removes the prisoners’ hijabs.
Any attempt to invoke their right to refuse the removal of their hijab is met with barbarity and further forced naked searches. Occupation forces have not only confiscated Palestinian prisoners’ hijabs, but they have also confiscated any needles or threads to prevent prisoners from repairing the torn shoes and clothing that the occupation had replaced their modest attire with. Prisoners have no choice but to borrow each others’ shoes when they need them to go outside for breaks or to meet with their lawyers.

Systematic medical neglect; the necessary medical care is not provided to any of the women inside the occupation’s prisons facing diseases, injuries, and mental ailments exacerbated inside the prison.
The hardest times, reported by many imprisoned women, are during pregnancy, where they are denied all necessary medical attention and even deprived of sunlight.

Prison cells unfit for human habitation. Humidity, moldy walls, and blankets—if provided— that reek. This is how prisoners describe their rooms in which they are held.
Torture is meticulously designed into every detail possible, where, in addition to the widespread insects and pests that spread diseases and infections, the lights are turned on and off at the whim of the occupation soldiers and guards, after cutting access to control them from inside the cells. 

A Palestinian prisoner describes her arrest: “My house was raided and I was detained by special forces a week after the start of the assault on Gaza. I was taken to a police station in my residential area while being threatened with execution or “deportation to Gaza” along with insults and intimidation tactics.” She was then transferred, her hands and feet shackled, to an isolated area, where she was subjected to shabah (a form of torture) under heavy rain alongside prisoners from Gaza, in a brutal and horrifying scene.

Talking about the first hours inside Al-Damon prison, she says: “When I first entered, campaigns of repression and cell raids using batons and tear gas began, and all essential supplies that were previously available to prisoners including cooking utensils, electrical appliances, books, and more, were confiscated.” Based on what she was told by other prisoners, she added “Women are being detained in unprecedented numbers from across Palestine on a daily basis and at an increasingly rapid rate.”

She also mentioned the harsh circumstances and constant threats of rape that women from Gaza are experiencing. Many had been abducted from shelters and know nothing about their children or their whereabouts. One Palestinian prisoner from Gaza says, “I was abducted and I know nothing about my four-month-old baby, my heart is shattering with worry over him.”

**🚨 BREAKING: A French court approved the release of Georges Abdallah, the longest-held political prisoner in Europe—the internationalist, communist, fighter for liberation.**

He is set to be freed on **December 6th, 2024,** after recently reaching 40 years of imprisonment. His release is contingent upon him leaving France.

For four decades years, immense popular pressure has been directed on French, American, and European authorities to secure his freedom. Last summer, Georges submitted the ninth request for his release, as his minimum sentence ended in 1999. Despite this, American intervention repeatedly blocked his release. Notably, his eighth release request,** which was approved by the French judiciary in 2013**, would have seen his release, but was overturned by American pressure, absurdly arguing that that the 72-year-old man "may return to the battlefield." It was revealed in 2015 that Hillary Clinton ordered French FM Fabius to keep Georges imprisoned in 2015. **In fact, Georges has been eligible for release since 1999, but the state fears his capacity to galvanize the masses.**

Georges, from his humble Lebanese village of Al-Qoubaiyat, he was inspired by the revolutionary broadcasts of the PFLP, and soon formed and led the Lebanese Armed Revolutionary Factions (LARF). When the zionist enemy invaded Lebanon in 1982, he worked tirelessly to halt the supply of weapons from Europe to the zionist entity. He was arrested in 1984 under fabricated charges—French police claimed that weapons that were never present were found. By 1987, he was convicted for the alleged murder of a US Army officer and a zionist embassy official in Paris.

Georges neither confirmed nor denied the allegations. To him, the trial was a farce. **His position was clear: the French state and its authorities are complicit in the occupation of Lebanon and Palestine.** To him, the courts were theatrics, a tool of imperialism to obfuscate the complicity of the US and France in the bombing of his country. 

In his own words:
[**__"Comrades, let us be vigilant and prevent the zionist criminals from annihilating the revolutionary heroes in captivity!"__**](https://t.me/RNN_Prisoners/1096)
**__"Let us be worthy of the epic of the torches of freedom, those invincible resistance heroes detained in zionist prisons! Naturally, the popular Palestinian masses and their fighting vanguards in captivity can count on your active solidarity.
